secretsOfTheJedi.description: Lightsaber becomes a career skill. You may also decrease the difficulty of checks made to construct/repair lightsaber hilts a number of times equal to half your ranks in Knowledge (Lore) (Rounded up), to a minimum of Easy (1)
secretsOfTheJedi.name: Secrets Of The Jedi

seenALotOfThings.description: Whenever you fail a Knowledge check, you may spend 3 Advantage to roll the check again during your next turn
seenALotOfThings.name: Seen A Lot Of Things

seizeTheInitiative.description: Once per session, as a maneuver, you may make a Hard (3) Athletics check. On a success, every Player Character that has not acted this round may take their turns immediately, rather than where they were in the initiative order.
seizeTheInitiative.name: Seize The Initiative

selectiveDetonation.description: When using any weapon with the Blast quality, you may spend 1 Advantage to exclude 1 target that would normally be affected by the explosion. Can be repeated as many times as you have ranks in Selective Detonation
selectiveDetonation.name: Selective Detonation

shortcut.description: During a chase, add 1 Boost per ranks in Shortcut to any checks made to catch or escape an opponent.
shortcut.name: Shortcut

showboat.description: When making a check in a starship or vehicle, you may suffer 2 strain to gain Triumph on success, or Despair on a failure.
showboat.name: Showboat

sideStep.description: Once per round, you may perform a Side Step maneuver and suffer a number of strain no greater than ranks of Side Step. Upgrade the difficulty of all incoming ranged attacks by the strain suffered until the next round.
sideStep.name: Side Step

signatureVehicle.description: Choose one starship or vehicle with a Silhouette of 3 or lower you own to be your Signature Vehicle. Upgrade all Mechanics checks made on that vehicle once.
signatureVehicle.name: Signature Vehicle

situationalAwareness.description: Allies within short range of the vehicle add 1 Boost to their Perception and Vigilance checks. Allies within close range add 2 Boost instead.
situationalAwareness.name: Situational Awareness

skilledJockey.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Skilled Jockey from all Piloting checks the character attempts
skilledJockey.name: Skilled Jockey

skilledSlicer.description: When making a Computers check, you may spend 1 Triumph to make further checks within this system as maneuvers
skilledSlicer.name: Skilled Slicer

sleightOfMind.description: Add 1 Boost to all Stealth checks (unless the opponent is immune to force powers)
sleightOfMind.name: Sleight of Mind

smartHandling.description: Once per session, you make take the Smart Handling action; Make a Hard (3) Knowledge (Education) check. Until the start of the next round, your ships handling increases by 2 + uncancelled Advantage to a maximum of 4
smartHandling.name: Smart Handling

smoothTalker.description: When first acquired, choose 1 skill from: Charm, Coercion, Deception, or Negotiation. When making checks with that skill, you may spend 1 Triumph to gain additional Successes equal to ranks in Smooth Talker
smoothTalker.name: Smooth Talker

sniperShot.description: Before making a non-thrown ranged attack, you may perform a Sniper Shot maneuver to increase the weapons range by 1 band per rank of Sniper Shot. Upgrade the difficulty of the attack by 1 per range band increase.
sniperShot.name: Sniper Shot

softSpot.description: After making a successful attack, you may spend 1 Destiny point to add damage equal to your Cunning to one hit.
softSpot.name: Soft Spot

solidRepairs.description: You repair an additional 1 hull trauma per rank of Solid Repairs whenever you repair a starship or vehicle
solidRepairs.name: Solid Repairs

soothingTone.description: Take a Soothing Tone action; Make an Average (2) Knowledge (Xenology) check to allow a beast to recover strain equal to uncancelled Success.
soothingTone.name: Soothing Tone

soundInvestments.description: At the start of each session, gain 100 credits per rank of Sound Investments
soundInvestments.name: Sound Investments

spareClip.description: You cannot run out of ammo on a Despair. Items with the Limited Ammo Quality run out as normal.
spareClip.name: Spare Clip

speaksBinary.description: When directing NPC droids, you may grant them 1 boost per rank of Speaks Binary on  all skill checks.
speaksBinary.name: Speaks Binary

spur.description: Take a Spur action; Make a Hard (3) Survival check to increase a beast's top speed by 1. The beast suffers 2 strain every round it stays spurred.
spur.name: Spur

stalker.description: Add 1 boost die per rank of Stalker to all Stealth and Coordination checks
stalker.name: Stalker

steadyAim.description: You don't lose the benefits of the Aim maneuver by performing other maneuvers/actions (including moving). You lose the benefits of Aim at the end of an encounter instead
steadyAim.name: Steady Aim

steelyNerves.description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to ignore effects of Critical Injuries on Willpower or Presence Checks until the end of the encounter.
steelyNerves.name: Steely Nerves

stimApplication.description: Take the Stim Application Action; make an Average (2) Medicine Check. If successful, 1 ally in engaged range increases 1 characteristic by 1 for the remainder of the encounter, and suffers 4 strain.
stimApplication.name: Stim Application

stimpackSpecialization.description: Stimpacks heal 1 additional wound per rank of Stimpack Specialization
stimpackSpecialization.name: Stimpack Specialization

streetSmarts.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Street Smarts from Streetwise or Knowledge (Underworld) checks.
streetSmarts.name: Street Smarts

strokeOfGenius.description: Once per session, you may make 1 skill check using Intellect, rather than the characteristic linked to that skill.
strokeOfGenius.name: Stroke of Genius

strongArm.description: Treat thrown wewapons as if they had 1 greater range.
strongArm.name: Strong Arm

stunningBlow.description: When making Melee checks, you may inflict damage as strain, rather than wounds. This does not ignore soak
stunningBlow.name: Stunning Blow

supportingEvidence.description: When assisting an ally with a Charm, Deception, Leadership, or Negotiation check, you add 1 Advantage per rank of Supporting Evidence
supportingEvidence.name: Supporting Evidence

suppressingFire.description: You and allies in short range may spend 1 Advantage on filed combat checks once per round to inflict 1 strain per rank of Suppressing Fire
suppressingFire.name: Suppressing Fire

supremeBodyGuard.description: The Body Guard maneuver may protect a number of engaged characters up to ranks in Resistance
supremeBodyGuard.name: Supreme Body Guard

supremeFullThrottle.description: When performing Full Throttle, top speed is increased by 2, instead of 1
supremeFullThrottle.name: Supreme Full Throttle

supremeInspiringRhetoric.description: Suffer 1 strain to perform Inspiring Rhetoric as a maneuver, rather than an action.
supremeInspiringRhetoric.name: Supreme Inspiring Rhetoric

supremePrideAndJoy.description: While inside your Pride And Joy, once per session, as an incidental, you may reduce its silhouette by 2 (to a minimum of 0) until the end of the next round
supremePrideAndJoy.name: Supreme Pride And Joy

supremeScathingTirade.description: Suffer 1 Strain to perform Scathing Tirade as a maneuver, rather than an action
supremeScathingTirade.name: Supreme Scathing Tirade

supremeSpur.description: When activating and maintaining Spur, the beast only suffers 1 Strain, instead of 2
supremeSpur.name: Supreme Spur

supremeStimApplication.description: When performing the Stim Application action, you may spend 1 triumph to increate an additional characteristic by 1.
supremeStimApplication.name: Supreme Stim Application

surgeon.description: When making a Medicine check to help a character heal wounds, the target heals 1 additional wound per rank of Surgeon
surgeon.name: Surgeon

swift.description: Do not suffer usual penalties for moving through difficult terrain.
swift.name: Swift

tacticalCombatTraining.description: Melee and Ranged (Heavy) become career skills
tacticalCombatTraining.name: Tactical Combat Training

targetedBlow.description: After making a successful attack, you may spend 1 Destiny Point to add damage equal to Agility to one hit
targetedBlow.name: Targeted Blow

targetedFirepower.description: Once per session, you may take a Targeted Firepower action; Identify one enemy target and make a Hard (3) Knowledge (Warfare) check. If successful, for the rest of the encounter allies within short range of you add 1 Advantage for each Success in checks against the target.
targetedFirepower.name: Targeted Firepower

technicalAptitude.description: Reduce the time needed to complete Computer related tasks by 25% per rank of Technical Aptitude
technicalAptitude.name: Technical Aptitude

templeTraining.description: Before making a Lightsaber check, you may spend 1 Destiny Point to add damage to the attack equal to your ranks in Knowledge (Lore)
templeTraining.name: Temple Training

thatsHowItsDone.description: You may suffer 1 strain on a successful check to add 1 Advantage to the same skill check made by a number of Allies equal to Willpower within short range during the next round.
thatsHowItsDone.name: That's How It's Done

thoroughAssessment.description: Once per session, you may take a Thorough Assessment action; Make a Hard (3) Knowledge Check to gain Boost dice equal to uncancelled Success that can be distributed during the encounter.
thoroughAssessment.name: Thorough Assessment

timeToGo.description: May spend 1 Destiny Point to perform a Move maneuver as an incidental to attempt to move into cover or out of the Blast range of a weapon or explosion
timeToGo.name: Time To Go

tinkerer.description: You may add 1 additional hardpoint to your items per rank in Tinkerer
tinkerer.name: Tinkerer

trickyTarget.description: Count the vehicle or starship  piloted as having a silhouette 1 lower when being attacked
trickyTarget.name: Tricky Target

trueAim.description: Once per round, you may perform a True Aim maneuver to gain the benefits of aiming, and upgrade the ability of the next combat check once per rank of True Aim.
trueAim.name: True Aim

trustNoOne.description: When targeted by a social check, you may suffer 1 Strain to add 1 Failure to the check. If the check fails with Despair, you may immediately perform a maneuver as an out-of-turn incidental
trustNoOne.name: Trust No One

trustTheCaptain.description: You may make a Trust The Captain action; Make a Hard (3) Leadership check. If successful, for the rest of the encounter, allies within short range increase their ranks of Discipline by your ranks in Trust The Captain
trustTheCaptain.name: Trust The Captain

tunedManeuveringThruster.description: Increase the handling of your Signature Vehicle by 1 per rank of Tuned Maneuvering Thruster
tunedManeuveringThruster.name: Tuned Maneuvering Thrusters

twistedWords.description: When targeted by a social check, you may spend 1 Despair or 2 Threat, and suffer 1 Strain as an incidental to inflict strain equal to ranks in Coercion on the speaker
twistedWords.name: Twisted Words

uncannyReactions.description: Add 1 Boost per rank of Uncanny Reactions to all Vigilance checks
uncannyReactions.name: Uncanny Reactions

unstoppable.description: If a Critical Injury is 1, or reduced to 1, do not receive the Critical Injury
unstoppable.name: Unstoppable

utilityBelt.description: Spend 1 Destiny Point to perform a Utility Belt incidental; produce a previously undocumented item (with rarity 4 or less) or weapon (with the Limited Ammo 1 quality) from a tool belt or satchel.
utilityBelt.name: Utility Belt

utinni.description: Remove 1 Setback per rank of Utinni! from all checks to find or scavenge items or gear. Such checks take half the time.
utinni.name: Utinni!

valuableFacts.description: Once per encounter, you may perform a Valuable Facts action; Make an Average (2) Knowledge check to add 1 Triumph to one ally's skill check during this encounter
valuableFacts.name: Valuable Facts

vehicleCombatTraining.description: Gunnery and Piloting (Planetary) become career skills
vehicleCombatTraining.name: Vehicle Combat Training

weakFoundation.description: Once per session, you may take the Weak Foundation action; Make a Hard (3) Knowledge (Warfare) check. If successful, for the remainder of the encounter you and all allies add 2 Advantage or 1 Success to all combat checks made targeting the identified fixed structure.
weakFoundation.name: Weak Foundation

wellRead.description: Choose any 3 Knowledge Skills. They permanently become career skills.
wellRead.name: Well Read

wellRounded.description: Choose any 2 skills. They permanently become career skills.
wellRounded.name: Well Rounded

wellTravelled.description: Knowledge (Core) and (Outer Rim) become career skills
wellTravelled.name: Well-Travelled

wheelAndDeal.description: When selling goods legally, you gain 10% more credits per rank of Wheel And Deal.
wheelAndDeal.name: Wheel And Deal

worksLikeACharm.description: Once per session, make one skill check using Presence, rather than the characteristic linked to that skill
worksLikeACharm.name: Works Like A Charm
